title: SO HE'S FINALLY HERE, OWNING FOR YOU
body:
http://media0.giphy.com/media/9CAkXcO7DBzmU/giphy.gif

IF YOU KNOW THE WORDS YOU CAN JOIN IN TOO
PUT YOUR HANDS TOGETHER IF YA WANT TO CLAP
AS WE TAKE YOU THROUGH THIS TEAM BACON RAP

HUH

G P

BACONSTR1PZ

HE'S THE GREATEST OF ALL TIME
YOU KNOW HE'S THE BEST
HE'S FINALLY BACK
TO RAPE YO ASS

HIS PARRLEY ON Q
CAN PROC ON HITS
IF HE SHOOTS YA
**IT'S GONNA CRIT**

HE'S GREATER, GOATER, AND BESTER TOO
HE'S THE FIRST MEMBER OF THE BACON CREW

G P

BACONSTR1PZ

G P

BACONSTR1PZ THE GOAT

THIS GOAT'S GOT SWAG
SO LISTEN UP NERDS
HE STILL PLAYS TALON
EVEN AFTER NERFS

IF YOU CHOSE AHRI
YOU HAVE CHOSE WRONG
AHRI MAINS ARE VIRGINS
AND PLEEP HAS A BIG DONG

HUH

G P

BACONSTR1PZ

HE HAS NO STYLE
HE HAS NO SHAME
THIS GOAT
IS AN EZREAL MAIN

PROC HIS MURAMANA
ON YOU DUMBASS NERDS
THE FREELO EXPLORER
REALLY NEEDS NERFS

G P

BACONSTR1PZ

HUH

i don't know who chortle is

HUH

FINALLY,
HE'S HERE FOR YOU
HE'S THE LAST MEMBER
OF THE GP CREW

HE HAS NO CC
HE PLAYS LEAGUE WHILE HIGH
AND THIS SHYV
IS ALSO BRONZE 5

HUH

G P

BACONSTR1PZ

http://grooveshark.com/s/DK+Rap/6I1RjZ?src=5

TEAM BACON

\#FREETHEGOAT
